content.text: Could you create a "hello.txt" and put a nice message in it? (:
Error: Access denied - path outside allowed directories: E:\Hume General\Programming\Repos\agent-dashboard\hello.txt not in G:\My Drive\AI Resources\Open collection

Allowed directories:
G:\My Drive\AI Resources\Open collection

I apologize for the error. It seems I tried to create the file in a restricted directory. I can only write files to "G:\\My Drive\\AI Resources\\Open collection". Would you like me to create the "hello.txt" file there instead?
oh yes, in the open collection folder
Successfully wrote to G:\My Drive\AI Resources\Open collection\hello.txt
I've successfully created "hello.txt" in "G:\\My Drive\\AI Resources\\Open collection" with a nice message for you!
